title: Liverpool deserve quarter-final spot despite 'slapstick' finishing in loss to Inter, says Klopp
description: Liverpool's seven-match winning run in the Champions League is ended by Inter Milan, but Jurgen Klopp's side progress to the quarter-finals with a 2-1 aggregate win.

title: Lewandowski scores earliest Champions League hat-trick as Bayern hit seven
description: Robert Lewandowski scores the earliest ever Champions League hat-trick as Bayern Munich thrash Red Bull Salzburg 6-2 on aggregate to reach the quarter-finals.

title: Prince Andrew pays settlement ending sex assault case
description: A US judge has signed off court papers concluding the court case brought by Virginia Giuffre.

title: Bairstow ton rescues England against West Indies
description: Jonny Bairstow's hundred rescues England after another batting collapse on day one of the first Test against West Indies in Antigua.

title: Ros Atkins on… The UK’s refugee response
description: Ros Atkins looks at the UK's response to refugees fleeing Ukraine, and its family visa scheme.

title: Ukraine: Travel curfew halts Irish student's escape attempt
description: A 19-year-old Irish woman living in Sumy is observing a travel curfew as she tries to leave Ukraine.

title: Ukraine: Does the Home Office need to get a grip?
description: There's frustration and fury among MPs at the Home Office's response to those fleeing the war.

title: Andy Murray pledges to donate prize money to help children in Ukraine
description: Andy Murray pledges to donate his earnings from prize money for the rest of the year to help children affected by Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Zelensky's moments: From TV star to wartime leader
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, a comedian who had no experience of politics when elected, has emerged as a convincing war leader.

title: World Cup 2022: Wales' play-off with Austria to go ahead in March
description: Wales' World Cup play-off semi-final against Austria later this month will be played as scheduled.

title: Ukraine: Volodymyr Zelensky invokes Winston Churchill as he appeals to MPs
description: Ukrainian president calls for Russia to be recognised as a "terrorist state" in a speech to the Commons.

title: Ukraine: Trauma surgeon teaches medics over Zoom
description: More than 535 doctors from Ukraine joined a call to be taught how to treat injured people.

title: In full: Ukrainian President Zelensky's message to UK
description: President Zelensky makes an historic address in the House of Commons about the invasion by Russia.

title: Ukrainian actor Pasha Lee killed in Russian bombardment
description: Pasha Lee, 33, had signed up to defend his country at the start of the war.

title: Ukraine: Mother of Russian soldier asks 'Whose door should I knock on to get my child back?'
description: Families of Russian soldiers in Ukraine tell the BBC the men had no idea what they were getting into.

title: Ukraine crisis: Is the UK doing enough to help refugees?
description: How is the government helping Ukrainian refugees in the UK and in countries neighbouring Ukraine?

title: Vamps star tells of liposuction body-image pressure
description: James Brittain-McVey tells MPs he wishes he had talked to friends about worries over how he looked.

title: Ukraine: Frozen stars send messages of support to girl singing Let It Go
description: The child was filmed singing the track from the Disney film while sheltering in a Ukraine basement.

title: Clive Myrie: The Ukrainians I met are not about to give up
description: The presenter reflects on the indomitable locals he met in Kyiv - convinced they would defeat the Russians.

title: Ukraine: Are arms shipments from the West making a difference?
description: Russian has struggled to gain air supremacy as Ukrainian forces make use of missiles supplied by the West.

title: Ukraine war: UK can and will do more for refugees - minister
description: The UK has granted visas to 300 refugees fleeing the war in Ukraine so far, the Home Office says.

title: Healy helps Australia beat Pakistan at World Cup
description: Alyssa Healy helps Australia secure a comfortable seven-wicket win against Pakistan at the Women's World Cup.

title: Shane Warne: Do liquid diets work and are they safe?
description: What do experts make of the diet Shane Warne was on?

title: Fury's future plans, AJ's new coach and Khan's rematch ambition - Fight Talk
description: Will Tyson Fury hang up his gloves after facing Dillian Whyte? Plus Anthony Joshua announces new trainer and Amir Khan reportedly wants a rematch with Kell Brook. It's Fight Talk.

title: War in Ukraine: Russia says it may cut gas supplies if oil ban goes ahead
description: A top official says Russia may close its gas lines to Germany if the West halts oil imports.

title: War in Ukraine: President Zelensky posts video from office in Kyiv
description: The Ukrainian president reveals his location in Kyiv in a new video shared on social media.

title: McDonald's and Coca-Cola boycott calls grow over Russia
description: Food and drink giants have been criticised on social media for failing to speak out on Ukraine's invasion.

title: Cost of living: Warning UK faces biggest income squeeze in nearly 50 years
description: The war in Ukraine will lead to an even tighter squeeze on living standards this spring, a think tank says.

title: Ukraine: Volodymyr Zelensky to address UK MPs in Commons
description: The Ukrainian president will speak via video link to British politicians on Tuesday.

title: Zverev given suspended eight-week ban for striking umpire's chair
description: World number three Alexander Zverev faces an eight-week ban from tennis if he repeats the behaviour which led to his expulsion from the Mexican Open.

title: War in Ukraine: Live-streaming music from a Kharkiv basement
description: Alex's house was destroyed by shelling, and he and his bandmates are sheltering in their basement studio.

title: Angel City FC: Eni Aluko on working for the Los Angeles franchise
description: With Angel City FC kicking off their debut NWSL campaign this month, Eni Aluko tells BBC Sport about moving to LA and meeting the club's all-star backers.

title: I've cut out energy drinks now mum's given me a kidney
description: Elaine Horne donated a kidney to her 23-year-old son Luke after he almost died from kidney failure.

title: The Papers: Putin's 'cynical' refugee offer and UK urged to help
description: The growing humanitarian crisis in Ukraine and soaring energy prices lead Tuesday's front pages.

title: War in Ukraine: World Bank approves $723m financial package
description: The package of financial support for Ukraine includes a $100m pledge from the UK.

title: Ukraine invasion: False claims the war is a hoax go viral
description: False claims have been spreading that the Ukraine war is a hoax and that actors have been involved in staging events.

title: Chaos, upheaval and exhaustion for Ukraine's disabled children
description: The BBC's Fergal Keane travels on a bus with disabled children fleeing the bombed city of Kharkiv.

title: Femicide detectives: 'Counting bodies is the best place to start'
description: Many countries do not record femicide - the most extreme form of gender-based violence - so activists are doing it themselves.

title: Public sexual harassment: PM urged to ‘step up’ on women’s safety
description: A survey for the BBC suggests 43% of women have experienced unwelcome touching in public.

title: Covid vaccines not linked to deaths, major US study finds
description: The CDC says 92% of reported side effects after the Pfizer and Moderna vaccines are mild.

title: Amazon rainforest reaching tipping point, researchers say
description: The world's largest rainforest is fast losing its ability to bounce back from human impacts, researchers say.

title: Ukraine: Small and big ways in which people in the UK are helping out
description: BBC Radio 4's Today listeners share their ideas for ways to help Ukrainians in their time of need.

title: Turning Red: Killing Eve's Sandra Oh on celebrating Pixar, puberty and periods
description: The Killing Eve star reveals why she jumped at the chance to join Pixar's latest film Turning Red.

title: Why misogyny is at the heart of South Korea's presidential elections
description: Disgruntled young men who resent feminism are the focus of candidates vying to be president.

title: Ukraine: Documenting the war on TikTok
description: Valerisssh has posted videos online of her standing outside shelled buildings.

title: Government rescue of Bulb Energy set to cost taxpayers billions more
description: A buyer hasn't been found for the ailing supplier, so the the taxpayer will have to keep funding it.

title: War in Ukraine: Crisis is unleashing 'hell on earth' for food prices
description: The Ukraine war could push millions closer to starvation, the boss of the World Food Programme says.

title: Vera Wang: I find ageism so old-fashioned
description: Designer and fashion icon Vera Wang speaks about ageism and her experience of going viral at 72.
